page.title: 19Gray's Farm
page.content: Gray's farm has 5 sheep, and a lot of {Charolais and other Continental beef {cattle crosses.}There are no dairy cattle or calves ,because he buys 15 months to two year old cattle for fattening. He has {175 bullocks }and {151 {heifers}which are fed on{grass ,silage {and hay}and the older cattle on{90% {barley}mixed with silage and hay. He sells the beef cattle at{Banbury market. He employs 6 people and has 430 acres, 85 of barley and the rest hay and silage. Mr.Gray has owned the farm for 50 years.He has 4 Ford tractors and 1 Dexter tractor made in 1961.He makes 1000 tons of silage stored in 3 silage clamps,and 200 tons of hay.The fertilizer comes from ICI.
